page.title: 04Recreation
page.content: For {adults}there is a cricket and football club. They have proper teams for them both. At the{British Legion}there is a {snooker}and{darts club.}There is a {public house}called the{Black Bull. They have a{darts}club as well. For{children }there is a park with swings, climbing frames and a crows nest. Children can play football there as there are some goal posts. Most children do not use the playing field. They usually play in their gardens or fields. Some children ride horses. There is a Sunday school which meets every week. The teacher says part of the bible to you. When he has finished talking he gives you some sheets to do. There is a church in East Halton.
